description.zh-CN: Biophilic Design 是亲生物设计风格，适合健康、环保和生活方式类应用。将自然元素融入数字界面，使用绿色调、有机形状、流动曲线和自然纹理，营造和谐、宁静、与自然连接的氛围。
description.en-US: Biophilic Design style is suitable for health, environmental, and lifestyle applications. Integrating natural elements into digital interfaces, using green tones, organic shapes, flowing curves, and natural textures, it delivers harmonious, peaceful atmosphere with connection to nature.
